name: Blue: Museum Heist
description:
This is an interactive story presented in text. A map is also available, and it is recommended that this is used for planning and/or keeping track of your location. (If the game has trouble loading, press the "restart" button.)

You are the thief Blue. For this mission, you and your partner in crime, Radiohead, have been tasked with retrieving three cultural artefacts from a British museum to be given back to their original countries. Find them, and do so in Style, for what is more important for a phantom thief?
